tag.description: The namespace and ID of the tag which the block should be in to pass the check.
tag.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the tag which the block should be in to pass the check.

type.description:
## In Tag

---



[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/in_tag)

Checks whether the block is in a specified tag.

Type ID: `origins:in_tag`




---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:base_stone_overworld"
}
```

This example will check if the block is included in the `#minecraft:base_stone_overworld` (`data/minecraft/tags/blocks/base_stone_overworld.json`) block tag.
